tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE product_recalls (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  batch_number INT,
  recall_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE recalled_batches (
  recall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  batch_id INT,
  reason TEXT,
  recall_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (batch_id) REFERENCES product_batch(batch_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recall_notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recall_id INT,
  notification_type VARCHAR(50),
  notification_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (recall_id) REFERENCES recalled_batches(recall_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductBatch (batch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
product_id INT,
production_date DATE,
expiration_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE ProductRecall (recall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
batch_id INT,
recall_date DATE,
reason TEXT);

CREATE TABLE RecallNotification (notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
recall_id INT,
notification_date DATE,
notification_text TEXT);

CREATE TABLE RecallStatus (status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
recall_id INT,
status TEXT);

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  batch_number INT,
  manufacturing_date DATE,
  expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE batches (
  batch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  manufacturing_location VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recalls (
  recall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  batch_id INT,
  reason VARCHAR(255),
  recall_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recalls_history (
  recall_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  batch_id INT,
  reason VARCHAR(255),
  recall_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (recall_id, recall_date)
);
